{"appnews":{"appid":377160,"newsitems":[{"gid":"4732747437213559674","title":"Fallout 4 mod adds HD texture overhaul to Bethesda RPG","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PCGamesN/4732747437213559674","is_external_url":true,"author":"editor@pcgamesn.com","contents":"

As far as Fallout 4 mods go, there are a lot of them. The 2015 RPG game has been supported heavily by the community since launch, with game wide overhauls like Fallout: London and Fallout: Miami on the way, alongside bizarre creations like a Lego Fallout and a cardboard cutout of the one and only Todd Howard.

Read the rest of the story...

RELATED LINKS:
Fallout 4 mod Fallout: New Vegas remake has new update for you to try
Fallout ghouls can be explained by science, says microbiologist
Mysterious Fallout 4 mod resurfaces, making Bethesda RPG a horror game

","feedlabel":"PCGamesN","date":1667756086,"feedname":"PCGamesN","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4732747437205993032","title":"Fallout 4 mod Fallout: New Vegas remake has new update for you to try","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PCGamesN/4732747437205993032","is_external_url":true,"author":"editor@pcgamesn.com","contents":"

Fallout 4 mod Fallout: New Vegas remake (or, to give the official title, Fallout 4: New Vegas), attempts to rebuild the 2010 Obsidian classic as a full RPG game using Bethesda's Fallout 4 engine, and it's just got a huge series of updates, with a few features available for you to try out.

Read the rest of the story...

RELATED LINKS:
Fallout 4 mod adds HD texture overhaul to Bethesda RPG
Fallout ghouls can be explained by science, says microbiologist
Mysterious Fallout 4 mod resurfaces, making Bethesda RPG a horror game

","feedlabel":"PCGamesN","date":1667576805,"feedname":"PCGamesN","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4732747437202127215","title":"Fallout ghouls can be explained by science, says microbiologist","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PCGamesN/4732747437202127215","is_external_url":true,"author":"editor@pcgamesn.com","contents":"

Fallout ghouls, the skinless, gravel-throated former humans which transform the Bethesda RPG into a zombie game any time they appear, can actually be explained using science, claims one microbiologist on the Fallout Reddit.

Read the rest of the story...

RELATED LINKS:
Mysterious Fallout 4 mod resurfaces, making Bethesda RPG a horror game
Fallout 4 mod brings cardboard Todd Howard to your home
Fallout Lego is real and you can play the blocky Bethesda RPG now

","feedlabel":"PCGamesN","date":1667485127,"feedname":"PCGamesN","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4732747437199959351","title":"Fallout 4 horror mod Pilgrim returns, remastered, after vanishing for years","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PC Gamer/4732747437199959351","is_external_url":true,"author":"Christopher Livingston","contents":"

There are plenty of horrors in Fallout 4 already, but for those chasing a true horror experience, 2017 mod "Pilgrim: Dread the Commonwealth" completely transformed the post-apocalyptic RPG into a waking nightmare. Thick fog and spooky lighting turned Fallout 4's atmosphere into one of pure dread. As I said back then, it looked like a mix of Stalker: Shadow of Chernobyl and The Road, with a bit of The Witch thrown in... Read more.","feedlabel":"PC Gamer","date":1667433879,"feedname":"PC Gamer","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4732747437198644160","title":"Mysterious Fallout 4 mod resurfaces, making Bethesda RPG a horror game","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PCGamesN/4732747437198644160","is_external_url":true,"author":"editor@pcgamesn.com","contents":"

The mysterious Fallout 4 mod Pilgrim, which appeared to vanish after its initial launch, is suddenly back online, with a new remastered version once again transforming the Bethesda RPG into a twisted, Silent Hill-esque horror game.

Read the rest of the story...

RELATED LINKS:
Fallout ghouls can be explained by science, says microbiologist
Fallout 4 mod brings cardboard Todd Howard to your home
Fallout Lego is real and you can play the blocky Bethesda RPG now

","feedlabel":"PCGamesN","date":1667402790,"feedname":"PCGamesN","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4706851091183732615","title":"Fallout 4 mod brings cardboard Todd Howard to your home","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PCGamesN/4706851091183732615","is_external_url":true,"author":"editor@pcgamesn.com","contents":"

Need a new Fallout 4 mod that completely changes how you play the game? Well, this isn't it. Instead, a true champion of the modding community has done what no one else would dare to do, and has added Todd Howard of Bethesda into Fallout 4, which might just push the RPG game above New Vegas as the best in the series.

Read the rest of the story...

RELATED LINKS:
Fallout Lego is real and you can play the blocky Bethesda RPG now
Fallout 4 mod Fallout: London has 300 interiors to explore
Fallout 4 gets 4K, next-gen PC update as Bethesda overhauls RPG

","feedlabel":"PCGamesN","date":1667057277,"feedname":"PCGamesN","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4706851091174071022","title":"War sometimes changes: Here's a free Lego Fallout game","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PC Gamer/4706851091174071022","is_external_url":true,"author":"Christopher Livingston","contents":"

Fallout has been a computer game, a tabletop game, a mobile game, a YouTube series, and will soon be an Amazon TV series. What could possibly be left for the post-apocalyptic RPG?.. Read more.","feedlabel":"PC Gamer","date":1666898759,"feedname":"PC Gamer","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4706851091173184305","title":"Fallout Lego is real and you can play the blocky Bethesda RPG now","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PCGamesN/4706851091173184305","is_external_url":true,"author":"editor@pcgamesn.com","contents":"

Fallout Lego has long been a dream of fans of the Bethesda RPG game, a whole, actual videogame, mirroring the style of Lego Star Wars, Lego Indiana Jones, and all those Traveller's Tales hits. Well, as the apocalypse and survival franchise turns 25 years old, and we await further news on Elder Scrolls 6 and the Starfield release date, Fallout Lego is actually here. And you can play it now. For free.

Read the rest of the story...

RELATED LINKS:
Fallout 4 mod Fallout: London has 300 interiors to explore
Fallout 4 gets 4K, next-gen PC update as Bethesda overhauls RPG
Fallout 4 mod trailer takes series to Miami while we wait on Bethesda

","feedlabel":"PCGamesN","date":1666875894,"feedname":"PCGamesN","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4706851091170058640","title":"Fallout TV series shows off a wasteland set, Nuka-Cola, and power armor","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PC Gamer/4706851091170058640","is_external_url":true,"author":"Christopher Livingston","contents":"

With Fallout celebrating its 25th birthday, Bethesda has been rolling out a series of short videos containing interviews with Todd Howard, Tim Cain, and other developers responsible for bringing the games to life for the past quarter-century. Topics have ranged from how Howard learned he'd be working on Fallout 3 (via a Post-It note) and how the beloved Fallout: New Vegas was almost just a big expansion pack instead of a standalone game... Read more.","feedlabel":"PC Gamer","date":1666803442,"feedname":"PC Gamer","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4714731755430123829","title":"Fallout 4 mod Fallout: London has 300 interiors to explore","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PCGamesN/4714731755430123829","is_external_url":true,"author":"editor@pcgamesn.com","contents":"

Fallout 4 mod Fallout: London, which will transport Bethesda's long-standing RPG game from the irradiated US to the equally irradiated UK, has a fresh gameplay video outlining 300 explorable interior locations, new perks, and even the in-game radio - definitely something to look forward to as we continue waiting on the Elder Scrolls 6 release date and, of course, the Starfield release date.

Read the rest of the story...

RELATED LINKS:
Fallout 4 gets 4K, next-gen PC update as Bethesda overhauls RPG
Fallout 4 mod trailer takes series to Miami while we wait on Bethesda
Fallout 4 mod remakes Bethesda RPG as a realistic war FPS

","feedlabel":"PCGamesN","date":1666696181,"feedname":"PCGamesN","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4714731755427382828","title":"Fallout 4 gets 4K, next-gen PC update as Bethesda overhauls RPG","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PCGamesN/4714731755427382828","is_external_url":true,"author":"editor@pcgamesn.com","contents":"

Fallout 4, the landmark apocalypse RPG game from Elder Scrolls and Starfield developer Bethesda, will receive an official next-gen update covering PC as well as Playstation 5 and Xbox Series X|S, with bug fixes, extra Creation Club content, and performance improvements for 4K resolution scheduled to land in 2023 - alongside, of course, the Starfield release date.

Read the rest of the story...

RELATED LINKS:
Fallout 4 mod Fallout: London has 300 interiors to explore
Fallout 4 mod trailer takes series to Miami while we wait on Bethesda
Fallout 4 mod remakes Bethesda RPG as a realistic war FPS

","feedlabel":"PCGamesN","date":1666630669,"feedname":"PCGamesN","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4714731755427155212","title":"Fallout 4 is getting a free 4K update next year","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PC Gamer/4714731755427155212","is_external_url":true,"author":"Andy Chalk","contents":"

midst the big celebration of the 25th anniversary of the original Fallout, Bethesda has announced that Fallout 4 is getting a free "next-gen update" in 2023—and yes, it's coming to PC... Read more.","feedlabel":"PC Gamer","date":1666626069,"feedname":"PC Gamer","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4714731755427128102","title":"Fallout 4 getting a new-gen upgrade in 2023, bringing best-boy Dogmeat to PS5 and Xbox Series X/S","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/VG247/4714731755427128102","is_external_url":true,"author":"","contents":"

As part of celebrating Fallout's 25th anniversary, Bethesda announced that Fallout 4 will be receiving a new-gen upgrade next year.

Fallout celebrated its 25th anniversary earlier this month, so Bethesda has been celebrating in a number of small ways. Those celebrations will slightly extend into 2023 apparently, as in a post rounding everything off with a mixture of interviews and more announced that Fallout 4 will be receiving a free update that will bring the game to Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5.

The update will include "performance mode features for high frame rates, quality features for 4K resolution gameplay, bug fixes and even bonus Creation Club content," and will also be coming to PC whenever it does launch next year. A specific window wasn't provided on when we can expect that update to arrive, so, sometime in 2023 it is.

Read more

","feedlabel":"VG247","date":1666625078,"feedname":"VG247","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4714731755409862690","title":"Zombie Queen Elizabeth and King Charles cut from Fallout: London mod","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PC Gamer/4714731755409862690","is_external_url":true,"author":"Christopher Livingston","contents":"

One of the most exciting Fallout 4 mods in the semi-near future is Fallout: London, which is due out in 2023 and will take us across the Atlantic to see how jolly old England coped with a bunch of nukes being dropped on it. We've seen a lot of the mod already, both in this lengthy gameplay video and another that gave us a tantalizing glimpse of ridable bicycles and weaponized elephants... Read more.","feedlabel":"PC Gamer","date":1666215782,"feedname":"PC Gamer","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"6402455182504164824","title":"Starfield has more talking than Skyrim and Fallout 4 combined","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/Rock, Paper, Shotgun/6402455182504164824","is_external_url":true,"author":"","contents":"

It’s been months since we’ve heard much from Bethesda’s upcoming sci-fi RPG Starfield, but studio director Todd Howard has been answering some questions about the game in a new video series. You can watch Howard chatting about the make-believe space programme below, where he covers if Starfield is hard sci-fi (not really), the games traits system, and dialogue. It seems that Starfield RPG's are incredibly chatty, with many times more dialogue than Fallout 4 and Skyrim.

Read more

","feedlabel":"Rock, Paper, Shotgun","date":1665656702,"feedname":"Rock, Paper, Shotgun","feed_type":0,"appid":72850},{"gid":"4867853509331538069","title":"Fallout 4 mod trailer takes series to Miami while we wait on Bethesda","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PCGamesN/4867853509331538069","is_external_url":true,"author":"editor@pcgamesn.com","contents":"

There are a lot of really great Fallout 4 mods, but few like the upcoming Fallout: Miami, which has celebrated the post-apocalyptic RPG game's 25th anniversary with a new trailer for the fan-developed content that adds a new world space, main and side quests, equipment, and characters.

Read the rest of the story...

Fallout 4 mod remakes Bethesda RPG as a realistic war FPS
Meet the Fallout 4 Pip-Boy gaming PC mod you can't fit on your wrist

","feedlabel":"PCGamesN","date":1665591553,"feedname":"PCGamesN","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4613399405944244442","title":"Fallout 4 mod remakes Bethesda RPG as a realistic war FPS","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PCGamesN/4613399405944244442","is_external_url":true,"author":"editor@pcgamesn.com","contents":"

A new Fallout 4 mod completely transforms the Bethesda RPG into a realistic, brutal, and survival-based FPS set during a civil war, with visuals and style reminiscent of The Day Before, Road to Vostok, and Call of Duty.

Read the rest of the story...

","feedlabel":"PCGamesN","date":1665157989,"feedname":"PCGamesN","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4613399405938022466","title":"Add some close encounters to Fallout 4 with this alien invasion mod","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PC Gamer/4613399405938022466","is_external_url":true,"author":"Christopher Livingston","contents":"

We've known that aliens exist in the Fallout universe for a long time now, with crashed spaceships and alien corpses appearing in several games in the series. Heck, you can get beamed up to a mothership in an expansion for Fallout 3, and there's an alien invasion event in Fallout 76... Read more.","feedlabel":"PC Gamer","date":1665010279,"feedname":"PC Gamer","feed_type":0,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4588629064126269952","title":"Celebrate 25 Years of Fallout All Month Long","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/steam_community_announcements/4588629064126269952","is_external_url":true,"author":"JessBethesda","contents":"In October of 1997, players first encountered Fallout’s post-nuclear world and its memorable characters, irradiated monstrosities, impactful conversations and stark reminders that war…war never changes. 25 years later, the Fallout series is a best-selling franchise that not only helped define PC role-playing games and spawned entries across multiple console generations, but also has made its way to tabletop games and even an upcoming television series. Join us as we ring in a milestone year for Fallout throughout the entire month of October! [h2]A MONTH-LONG CELEBRATION[/h2] That’s right, we’re not just celebrating Fallout’s birthday, we’re celebrating Fallout’s birth*month*. Each week in October, you can visit [url=https://fallout.bethesda.net/en/fallout25th]fallout25th.com[/url] to learn what we’ve got planned for that week’s festivities. From sales and giveaways to special features and community content, there’ll be lots to check out celebrating Fallout’s 25th anniversary! Speaking of which, don’t forget to join the party on social media. Use the hashtag **#Fallout25** and be sure to follow our official [url=https://twitter.com/Fallout]Twitter[/url], [url=https://www.instagram.com/fallout/]Instagram[/url] and [url=https://www.facebook.com/Fallout]Facebook[/url] accounts to see what the Fallout community is cooking up. We’re also excited to announce that a Twitter Community and dedicated chat on the official Fallout Discord channel so you can celebrate right with your fellow fans! Stay tuned to our social media channels for more information. [img]https://images.ctfassets.net/rporu91m20dc/2Wypzr140eCdVvDqQUab48/ca7c6333dd702e4ec6db7f38d396104c/F76_Pitt_Key_Art_in-body.png[/img] [h3]FALLOUT 76 FREE PLAY WEEK[/h3] Haven’t taken a dive into Fallout 76? Explore post-nuclear Appalachia (and, following the game’s recent Expeditions update, [url=https://fallout.bethesda.net/en/article/7iswEuZf5CujgLYGg08OsN/fallout-76-expeditions-the-pitt-update-live]The Pitt [/url]with your friends at no additional charge during Fallout 76’s Free Play Week, starting [b]October 4[/b] to [b]October 11[/b]. [img]https://images.ctfassets.net/rporu91m20dc/73TAPqOymGcKsQ0VHJga92/47b57f57e2725d75eee24cebdb12f91c/F25_PALS_in-body.png[/img] [h3]FACTION QUIZ[/h3] There are numerous groups, organizations, cults and plain ol’ gangs that call their slice of Fallout’s world home. That’s why we developed the [url=https://fallout.bethesda.net/en/fallout25th/]Post-Apocalyptic Loyalty Simulator[/url], or P.A.L.S., questionnaire to help you find which post-nuclear faction suits you. Find where you belong in Fallout and share with your friends! [img]https://images.ctfassets.net/rporu91m20dc/VF0ElVwhvra28GJe0CaTt/5f387d21cab57d8e2bb217ab109aa86c/F25_Shelter_in-body.png[/img][h3]A NEW UPDATE COMES TO FALLOUT SHELTER![/h3] Overseers rejoice: In celebration of Fallout’s 25th anniversary, we’re adding new content to Fallout Shelter for the first time in over four years! Take on an alien threat in an all-new quest line featuring new enemies, take up arms with new weapons, recruit new Dwellers and decorate your Vault with a new celebration room theme. We’ll have more to show off when the updates launches soon, so stay tuned! This month will be a blast for any Fallout fan – one you won’t need a Vault to hide from – and we look forward to seeing you all emerge during our 25th anniversary celebration!","feedlabel":"Community Announcements","date":1664828473,"feedname":"steam_community_announcements","feed_type":1,"appid":377160},{"gid":"4589754330747742108","title":"Meet the Fallout 4 Pip-Boy gaming PC mod you can't fit on your wrist","url":"https://steamstore-a.akamaihd.net/news/externalpost/PCGamesN/4589754330747742108","is_external_url":true,"author":"editor@pcgamesn.com","contents":"

Making a custom gaming PC mod is a chance to get creative, and this Fallout 4 Pip-Boy case is definitely one for fans of the post-apocalyptic franchise. Anyone who's familiar with how to build a gaming PC knows there are endless ways to go about it, and taking a limited edition video game accoutrement and stuffing PC hardware into it is a great way to make use of old plastic.

Read the rest of the story...

RELATED LINKS:

Fallout 4 mod completely overhauls Bethesda's apocalypse RPG
The best Fallout 4 mods in 2022
